texto: 6.3.1.2 Outcomes As a result of the successful implementation of the Project Planning process: a) Objectives and plans are defined. b) Roles, responsibilities, accountabilities, and authorities are defined. c) Resources and services necessary to achieve the objectives are formally requested and committed. d) Plans for the execution of the project are activated. 38 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet.
